message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $950,000. Let me know what you think.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $750,000? I believe this would still provide a significant return on investment for me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While $750,000 is quite a bit below my initial asking price, I understand your desire to work within a budget.  Could you meet me halfway at $875,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a wise investment at that price.

Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to meet you halfway at $825,000. This price aligns better with my current financial situation while still reflecting the value I see in the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
